{% extends 'layout.html' %} {% block pageTitle %} You cannot apply for a Provisional Replacement Certificate {% endblock %} {% block beforeContent %}

Prototype This is a prototype - your feedback will help us improve it.

{% endblock %} {% block content %}

You cannot apply for a PRC on behalf of a resident of that country

You can only get a PRC if you are a resident of the UK, an EU country, Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway, or Switzerland.

You cannot apply for a PRC for someone that lives in any other country.

{% endblock %}
